kpi.name: M1005C179

kpi_info.title: RL SETUP FAIL FOR FIRST RL DUE TO MISC CAUSE
kpi_info.use: The number of radio link setup failures for the first radio link due to miscellaneous cause. The first link can be established either in RRC connection setup or state transition to CELL-DCH. UPDATED:When a common NBAP signalling entity receives a NBAP:RADIO LINK SETUP FAILURE message from a BTS.

kpi.kpi_alias: RL SETUP FAIL FOR FIRST RL DUE TO MISC CAUSE
